snippet: Based on “Ghost Asylum” and “Angels Among Us,” there just may be an alternative energy source to harness in the spirit world.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger remarks that, based on new television shows Ghost Asylum on Destination America and Angels Among Us on TLC, the dead hang around the earthly plane so their spirits can be used to power hair dryers and hot tubs.
lead_paragraph: Based on “Ghost Asylum” and “Angels Among Us,” there just may be an alternative energy source to harness in the spirit world.

headline.seo: Theories From ‘Ghost Asylum’ and ‘Angels Among Us’
headline.main: Getting a Real Charge Out of Ghostly Visitations
headline.print_headline: Getting a Real Charge Out of Ghostly Visitations
